questions.question: When was the State of Maharashtra formed?
Which movement demanded the formation of Maharashtra state?
questions.answer: Samyukta Maharashtra Movement

questions.question: Which city became the capital of Maharashtra?
questions.answer: Mumbai

questions.question: Which state was divided to form Maharashtra and Gujarat?
questions.answer: Bombay State

questions.question: Who was a prominent leader of the Samyukta Maharashtra Movement?
questions.answer: S.M. Joshi

questions.question: Which language played a key role in the movement?
questions.answer: Marathi

questions.question: Which commission recommended reorganization of states on linguistic basis?
questions.answer: States Reorganisation Commission

questions.question: The demand for Maharashtra state was based mainly on ____.
questions.answer: Language

questions.question: Who became the first Chief Minister of Maharashtra?
questions.answer: Y.B. Chavan

questions.question: 1 May is celebrated in Maharashtra as ____.
questions.answer: Maharashtra Day

questions.question: When was the State of Maharashtra formed?
questions.answer: The State of Maharashtra was formed on 1 May 1960.

questions.question: What was the Samyukta Maharashtra Movement?
questions.answer: It was a movement demanding a separate state for Marathi-speaking people.

questions.answer: Bombay State was divided on linguistic basis to form Maharashtra and Gujarat.

questions.answer: He was the first Chief Minister of Maharashtra.

questions.answer: Because the State of Maharashtra was formed on that day in 1960.
